CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 15 reads: "8. Drake's bread booth was made more attractive to the kiddies with their comic books and pencils. Shown in attendance are, left to right, Miss Effie M. Brown, Mr. and Mrs. Sharlow and Mrs. Marjorie Morgan.  Exhibitors and visitors praised The Courier Home Service Show"
TitMainTitle: Effie M. Brown, Mr. and Mrs. Sharlow, and Marjorie Morgan standing in Drake's bread company booth in Syria Mosque for the 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Baked products--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
